name: POPPIK Polished Nail Paint Duo(2&19)
description: POPPIK Polished Nail Paint - Vibrant & Long-Lasting Nail Lacquer
detailedDescription:
Unleash Your Inner Artist with POPPIK Polished Nail Paint!
Elevate your manicure game with POPPIK Polished Nail Paint, designed to deliver stunning, salon-quality color right at your fingertips. Our premium formula glides on smoothly, offering vibrant, chip-resistant coverage that lasts. Whether you're in the mood for playful pastels or bold brights, POPPIK has the perfect shade to express your unique style.
benefits:
Vibrant, Opaque Color: Experience rich, brilliant color payoff with just a few strokes. Our highly pigmented formula ensures a striking finish every time.
Smooth & Easy Application: The expertly designed brush provides a streak-free, even application, making it effortless to achieve a flawless manicure at home.
Long-Lasting Wear: Enjoy a durable, chip-resistant finish that stands up to daily wear, keeping your nails looking fresh and beautiful longer.
Quick Drying: Spend less time waiting and more time shining! Our fast-drying formula helps you get back to your day sooner.
Beautifully Packaged: Each elegant glass bottle showcases the stunning color within, making it a stylish addition to your beauty collection or a thoughtful gift.
howToUse:
Start with clean, dry nails.
Apply one coat of your favorite POPPIK base coat (sold separately).
Apply 1-2 thin coats of POPPIK Polished Nail Paint, allowing each coat to dry completely.
Finish with a POPPIK top coat (sold separately) for extended wear and brilliant shine.

detailedDescription: This beauty product is designed for all skin types, delivering deep nourishment and a natural, healthy glow. Its lightweight, non-sticky formula absorbs quickly into the skin while keeping it hydrated throughout the day. Enriched with natural extracts, it leaves your skin soft, smooth, and refreshed. With regular use, it helps improve skin texture and gives you a bright, youthful appearance.

name: Poppik Makeup Fixer Spray + Micellar Water Combo.
description: This combo brings together two essentials every makeup lover needs: the Poppik Micellar Water for clean, fresh skin and the Poppik Makeup Fixer Spray for a long-lasting, flawless finish.
detailedDescription:
Start your routine with Micellar Water. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula lifts away dirt, oil, and makeup while keeping your skin soft and hydrated. It‚Äôs gentle enough for daily use and effective enough to remove even stubborn makeup.
Once your look is done, lock it in with the Makeup Fixer Spray. A quick mist keeps your makeup smudge-proof, fresh, and sweat-resistant for long hours. No stickiness. No heaviness. Just a smooth, natural finish.
Whether you‚Äôre getting ready for a busy day or prepping for a glam night out, this duo gives you the perfect before-and-after glow.
productsIncluded:
Brand: Poppik Lifestyle
Product Type: Makeup Fixer + Micellar Water
Skin Type: All Skin Types
Texture: Lightweight, Non-Sticky, Non-Greasy
Net Quantity: 100 ml + 100 ml
Country of Origin: India
Ideal For: Women, Men, Makeup Artists, Daily Use
benefits:
Perfect Daily Duo
A complete before-and-after combo. Prep your skin with Micellar Water and finish your look with the long-lasting Makeup Fixer Spray.

Long-Lasting Makeup Hold
The Makeup Fixer Spray keeps your makeup fresh, smudge-proof, and transfer-resistant for hours without any sticky feeling.

Lightweight & Skin-Friendly Formula
Both products are made with gentle, skin-safe ingredients designed for everyday use on all skin types.

Micellar Water for Deep Yet Gentle Cleansing
Removes dirt, oil, waterproof makeup, and impurities without drying out your skin. Clean, soft, fresh feel.

Non-Greasy, Non-Sticky Texture
No heavy residue. No greasy layer. Perfect for pre-makeup skin prep and post-makeup cleansing.

Travel-Friendly 100 ml Bottles
Carry them anywhere. Fits easily in vanity bags, travel kits, or makeup pouches.
howToUse:
Micellar Water:

Take a cotton pad.

Pour a small amount of Micellar Water.

Gently wipe over face, lips, and eyes to remove makeup and impurities.

No rinse needed.

Makeup Fixer Spray:

After completing your makeup, hold the bottle 10‚Äì12 inches away.

Close eyes and spray evenly in an ‚ÄúX‚Äù and ‚ÄúT‚Äù motion.

Let it dry naturally for a lasting makeup hold.

name: POPPIK 3-in-1 Lipstick Combo
description: Available In All Shades
detailedDescription:
Unleash your inner beauty with the ultimate lip combo from POPPIK ‚Äì a luxurious trio that delivers shine, style, and sophistication in every swipe. Designed for every mood and moment, this combo brings together three unique finishes ‚Äì a high-gloss glow, a rich liquid matte, and a classic creamy bullet matte ‚Äì to give your lips the perfect look for any occasion.
Whether you‚Äôre heading out for a glamorous night, a confident workday, or a soft romantic date, POPPIK 3-in-1 Lipstick Combo has you covered. Each formula is crafted with care using skin-loving ingredients like Vitamin E, Shea Butter, and Jojoba Oil to keep your lips soft, nourished, and hydrated all day long.
productsIncluded:
Combo Includes:
1x Glow Drop Liquid Gloss (5 ml)
1x LipLock Liquid Matte (6 ml)
1x MattePout Bullet Lipstick (3.8 g)

Finish: Glossy / Liquid Matte / Creamy Matte

Skin Type: Suitable for all skin types

Formula: Vegan, Paraben-free, Cruelty-free
benefits:
‚ú® Why You‚Äôll Love It:

‚úÖ 3 versatile lip textures in one combo
‚úÖ Long-lasting, transfer-proof & smudge-proof formula
‚úÖ Lightweight, non-sticky & comfortable wear
‚úÖ High color payoff with a single stroke
‚úÖ Vegan, cruelty-free & paraben-free
‚úÖ Suitable for all skin tones
howToUse:
Prep: Exfoliate lips gently for a smooth base.

Choose Your Look:

Apply Glow Drop Gloss for a radiant shine.

Use LipLock Liquid Matte for bold, long-lasting impact.

Swipe MattePout Bullet Lipstick for a creamy matte everyday look.

Mix & Match: Create custom looks by layering gloss over matte or blending two shades together for a unique finish.

name: POPPIK 2-in-1 CARAMEL HAZELNUT & FAIR BREEZE.
description: Trusted by artists, loved by all ‚Äî POPPIK Foundation & Concealer Combo is designed for professional-grade results.
detailedDescription: Achieve a camera-ready finish with POPPIK Flawless Duo ‚Äì your go-to foundation and concealer combo for a perfect, even-toned base. The SecondSkin Matte Foundation delivers smooth, full coverage while maintaining a breathable, skin-like texture. Paired with the HiCover Concealer, it brightens dark circles and hides blemishes for a naturally radiant glow. Whether you‚Äôre creating a soft everyday look or a glam finish, this 2-in-1 base duo helps you build your base and brighten your look ‚Äî effortlessly.
benefits:
üí´ 2-in-1 Flawless Duo: Includes SecondSkin Matte Foundation and HiCover Concealer for a seamless, radiant finish.

üéØ Buildable Coverage: Effortlessly layer from natural to full coverage without cakiness.

üíß Lightweight & Breathable: Smooth, matte formula that lets your skin breathe all day.

üåø Skin-Loving Ingredients: Infused with hydrating and skin-balancing actives for a healthy glow.

‚è± Long-Lasting Wear: Stay fresh and photo-ready from day to night.

‚ú® Perfect for All Skin Tones: Blends easily to even out complexion and conceal imperfections.
howToUse:
Apply SecondSkin Foundation evenly on the face using a brush, sponge, or fingertips.

Dab HiCover Concealer under eyes and on blemishes, then blend well.

Set with a compact or loose powder for a long-lasting, flawless look.

name: POPPIK Polished Nail Paint Duo(22&23)
description: POPPIK Polished Nail Paint - Vibrant & Long-Lasting Nail Lacquer
detailedDescription: Unleash Your Inner Artist with POPPIK Polished Nail Paint! Elevate your manicure game with POPPIK Polished Nail Paint, designed to deliver stunning, salon-quality color right at your fingertips. Our premium formula glides on smoothly, offering vibrant, chip-resistant coverage that lasts. Whether you're in the mood for playful pastels or bold brights, POPPIK has the perfect shade to express your unique style.
benefits:
Vibrant, Opaque Color: Experience rich, brilliant color payoff with just a few strokes. Our highly pigmented formula ensures a striking finish every time.
Smooth & Easy Application: The expertly designed brush provides a streak-free, even application, making it effortless to achieve a flawless manicure at home.
Long-Lasting Wear: Enjoy a durable, chip-resistant finish that stands up to daily wear, keeping your nails looking fresh and beautiful longer.
Quick Drying: Spend less time waiting and more time shining! Our fast-drying formula helps you get back to your day sooner.
Beautifully Packaged: Each elegant glass bottle showcases the stunning color within, making it a stylish addition to your beauty collection or a thoughtful gift.
howToUse:
Start with clean, dry nails.
Apply one coat of your favorite POPPIK base coat (sold separately).
Apply 1-2 thin coats of POPPIK Polished Nail Paint, allowing each coat to dry completely.
Finish with a POPPIK top coat (sold separately) for extended wear and brilliant shine.
